nodes.text: Ukon Eyste was a male Gran hitman and convicted killer who lived during the waning years of the Republic Classic era. Having a death sentence on six star systems, the Republic Security Force placed a bounty worth 3,000 credits alive and 1,500 dead. The bounty was claimed by Jango Fett.
Despite being labeled as armed and dangerous, Ukon Eyste is a coward.
If the player kills a Nexu, which tries to kill Ukon, he will run around in fear.
